reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 43/01: WITHDRAWAL OF AUTHORITY - PINE RIDGE MUNICIPAL PLANNING AGENCY
reg_info.reg_name_text: withdrawal of authority — pine ridge municipal planning agency
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 43/01: WITHDRAWAL OF AUTHORITY - PINE RIDGE MUNICIPAL PLANNING AGENCY
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The delegation of the Minister’s authority to give approval under section 51 of the Act to the Pine Ridge Municipal Planning Agency under Ontario Regulation 25/98 is withdrawn with respect to, (a) applications to approve a plan of subdivision whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule; and (b) all applications under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description made on or after February 19, 2001 with respect to land in the former Township of Hope.  O. Reg. 43/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The delegation of the Minister’s authority to give approval under section 51 of the Act to the Pine Ridge Municipal Planning Agency under Ontario Regulation 25/98 is withdrawn with respect to,

(a) applications to approve a plan of subdivision whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule; and

(b) all applications under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description made on or after February 19, 2001 with respect to land in the former Township of Hope.  O. Reg. 43/01, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 43/01, s. 2. Schedule 14 T 89001 PR Subdiv 2000/004 O. Reg. 43/01, Sched.
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 43/01, s. 2.

Schedule

14 T 89001

PR Subdiv 2000/004

O. Reg. 43/01, Sched.
